summary:
Industrial Engineer with 9 plus years of work experience in the Consumer Goods, Beauty Industry. Strong expertise in demand and supply planning through S&OP cycle management. Extensive knowledge and strong marketing/sales skills. Through my wide and diverse background, I have had the opportunity to work on different areas of the business (ranging from Marketing & Sales to Logistics & Operations) while learning, enriching and building a solid expertise on the industry; thinking strategically, building strong relationships, collaborative spirit and always adapting to new challenges.

I love practicing sports, I am an amateur triathlete and  I believe sports bring people together and reinforce values and skills that can be applied in our business life everyday: to achieve my goals and finish a race a must show determination, resilience, endurance and courage. I train, prepare myself, anticipate and understand where I am going in order to define an strategy to get to the end of the race. I work hard and with passion. My love for sports have also taught me to be competitive, as well as humble, to highly value collaboration with my teammates and to adapt and be flexible in front of unexpected circumstances and crisis.

With strong transferable skills to perform my responsibilities, I am excited to contribute in different areas of supply chain, sales and project management, implementing the knowledge I have learnt during my professional career.

Other Relevant Knowledge, Skills

Passionate • Negotiation • Leadership & Communication • Forecasting • Marketing & Sales Strategy • Future Master • Product Lifecycle Management • Negotiation • Teamwork • Analytical • Project Management • SAP • Cost Analysis • Inventory Management • Market & Competitor Research  • Power Bi

Multi-lingual fluent in English, Spanish and beginner level of Dutch.

education.degree_name: BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN PRODUCTION ENGINEERING

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading the forecasting process for luxury brand divisions guarantying the quality and consistency of sales forecast to optimize supply chain.

Responsible for controlling replenishment and management of inventory levels based on local parameter sizing and construction of stock equations for the different supply models
profile_positions.title: Senior Demand & Supply Planner

profile_positions.description:
- Propose, implement and monitor marketing mix strategies (IMC, 360, Digital & Retail) to build integrated, engaging consumer brand experiences for Fragrances and Skincare portfolio across the Americas.
- Implement launches and ensure growth on pillars by assuring sales forecast accuracy, proper execution of promotional, digital and advertising strategies, effective collaboration with other departments and efficient budget management.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Manage brands P&Ls increasing profits, implementing sales strategy and controlling purchasing budget per brand.
- Lead brands strategy and implementation of marketing and sales initiatives, maximizing company wholesales, increasing market share and decreasing inventory levels in the middle of a significant economic crisis.
- Define pricing strategy for each brand (competition study vs. cost of goods) to ensure optimum positioning.
- Lead PR brand presentations, training and events, and product launches for clients and field team.
- Improved return on investment (ROI) of marketing implementations by 35% in a year, by creating key performance indicator reports by brand and identifying risks and opportunities.
- Award: “Best Marketing Campaign Implementation” Award by leading the launch of Aura Loewe fragrance reaching the #1 country in sales volume.
profile_positions.title: Sales and Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Professional Products Division - Responsible for the brand Kérastase: marketing strategy, including product selection, promotions, price positioning, merchandising, launches forecasting, advertising and media planning.

-	Launched new category which represented (in just 3 months) 13% of wholesale of the Division, increasing brand leadership in the professional hair care products market.
-	Maximized % of profitability in marketing implementations working close with sales department on a new segmentation strategy of POS, enhancing the development of the main clients by 48% and a reduction of investment by 23% in 6 months.
-	Launched Kérastase Social Media.
profile_positions.title: Senior Brand Manager

profile_positions.description:
Professional Products  Division - Responsible for the brand Kérastase:

- In charge of execution of trade marketing activities in line with launch calendar and brand guidelines.
- Performed business cases and scenario models to demonstrate global cost and return of investment in advertising, promotion and sales development. 
- Analyzed and planned client inventory levels in collaboration with sales team, guaranteeing high final customer service level.
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager

profile_positions.description:
-	Designed, planned, implemented and supervised the launch of a new Kérastase axe. Successfully executing the Marketing Plan and Training Plan, achieving a level of sales (in units) that represented 40% of the annual wholesale of the brand.
-	Managed, controlled and improved marketing and promotion campaigns, maintaining the brand at the top position in the hair care professional market, with a market share of almost ¾ in its category. 
-	Planned, monitored and updated inventory levels, daily guaranteeing high level of customer service.
-	Developed collateral print material adapted for the different distribution channels.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern -  Brand  Kérastase

volunteer_experiences.description:
Website Link: https://www.nirvana-project.org/

Nirvana is a non-profit which main role is raise awareness in the inclusion of Athletes with physical and other disabilities and with special abilities in the sport of running, triathlons and obstacles races. 

My role as a volunteer is to support our athletes during the races, pushing them in their wheelchairs, or accompany them on a bike, giving hydration and food when needed and even assisting them in any emergency.

Being a triathlete and runner are part of my biggest passions and hobbies. Having the opportunity to support people with special conditions and help them to be included into these disciplines and make their dreams come true is part of my contribution to these beautiful sports.

https://cleanmiamibeach.org/

Clean Miami Beach is a US, Florida local nonprofit organization founded by Miami Beach resident Sophie Ringel dedicated to the protection of beautiful Miami Beach and its marine wildlife. Its mission is to keep MB community  and natural habitats free of garbage and other  harmful land pollutants with a focus on single-use plastic which are extremely damaging to the unique fragile ecosystem of Miami Beach and its marine wildlife.

As a volunteer i participate in biweekly beach clean ups, support on raising awareness on the cause and promote sustainability.
